verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הָל֛וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְקָנִ֥יתָ <S%H7069><s%> and get בַקְבֻּ֖ק <S%H1228><s%> bottle יוֹצֵ֣ר <S%H3335><s%> a potter's חָ֑רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> earthen וּמִזִּקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> and [take] of the ancients הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וּמִזִּקְנֵ֖י <S%H2205><s%> and of the ancients הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> of the priests

וְיָצָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> And go forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גֵּ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> unto the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom אֲשֶׁ֕ר <S%H834><s%> which פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> which [is] by the entry שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate [הַחֲרָסוּת כ] (הַֽחַרְסִ֑ית <S%H2777><s%> east ק) וְקָרָ֣אתָ <S%H7121><s%> and proclaim שָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> there the words אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that I shall tell אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> and to

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And say שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> ye the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> O kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> and inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֩ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am about מֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I will bring רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> upon this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of everyone שֹׁמְעָ֖הּ <S%H8085><s%> the which whosoever heareth תִּצַּ֥לְנָה <S%H6750><s%> shall tingle אָזְנָֽיו׃ <S%H241><s%> his ears

יַ֣עַן ׀ <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they עֲזָבֻ֗נִי <S%H5800><s%> Because they have forsaken וַֽיְנַכְּר֞וּ <S%H5234><s%> me and have estranged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> this place הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this וַיְקַטְּרוּ־ <S%H6999><s%> and have burned incense בוֹ֙ לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> in it unto other אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> that לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither יְדָע֛וּם <S%H3045><s%> have known הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וַאֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> whom neither they nor their fathers וּמַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> nor the kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמָֽלְא֛וּ <S%H4390><s%> and have filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> this place הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this דַּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> with the blood נְקִיִּֽם׃ <S%H5355><s%> of innocents

וּבָנ֞וּ <S%H1129><s%> They have built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> also the high places הַבַּ֗עַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal לִשְׂרֹ֧ף <S%H8313><s%> to burn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H1121><s%> their sons בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire עֹל֣וֹת <S%H5930><s%> [for] burnt offerings לַבָּ֑עַל <S%H1168><s%> unto Baal אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> never צִוִּ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> of nor דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> not nor spake וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> of nor עָלְתָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> [it] neither came עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> [it] into my mind פ

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> Therefore behold the days בָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יִקָּרֵא֩ <S%H7121><s%> shall no more be called לַמָּק֨וֹם <S%H4725><s%> that this place הַזֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> this ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer הַתֹּ֖פֶת <S%H8612><s%> Tophet וְגֵ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> nor The valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֑ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo גֵּ֥יא <S%H1516><s%> but The valley הַהֲרֵגָֽה׃ <S%H2028><s%> of slaughter

וּ֠בַקֹּתִי <S%H1238><s%> And I will make void אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצַ֨ת <S%H6098><s%> the counsel יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem בַּמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְהִפַּלְתִּ֤ים <S%H5307><s%> and I will cause them to fall בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> by the sword לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> their enemies וּבְיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> and by the hands מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <S%H1245><s%> of them that seek נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> their lives וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלָתָם֙ <S%H5038><s%> and their carcases לְמַֽאֲכָ֔ל <S%H3978><s%> to be meat לְע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> for the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven וּלְבֶהֱמַ֥ת <S%H929><s%> and for the beasts הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּי֙ <S%H7760><s%> And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְשַׁמָּ֖ה <S%H8047><s%> desolate וְלִשְׁרֵקָ֑ה <S%H8322><s%> and an hissing כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> every one that passeth עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> because יִשֹּׁ֥ם <S%H8074><s%> thereby shall be astonished וְיִשְׁרֹ֖ק <S%H8319><s%> and hiss עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all מַכֹּתֶֽהָ׃ <S%H4347><s%> because of all the plagues

וְהַֽאֲכַלְתִּ֞ים <S%H398><s%> And I will cause them to eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh בְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1121><s%> of their sons וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> and the flesh בְּנֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> of their daughters וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> the flesh רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> of his friend יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> and they shall eat בְּמָצוֹר֙ <S%H4692><s%> in the siege וּבְמָצ֔וֹק <S%H4689><s%> and straitness אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָצִ֧יקוּ <S%H6693><s%> shall straiten לָהֶ֛ם אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H341><s%> wherewith their enemies וּמְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <S%H1245><s%> and they that seek נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H5315><s%> their lives

וְשָׁבַרְתָּ֖ <S%H7665><s%> Then shalt thou break הַבַּקְבֻּ֑ק <S%H1228><s%> the bottle לְעֵינֵי֙ <S%H5869><s%> in the sight הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> of the men הַהֹלְכִ֖ים <S%H1980><s%> that go אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> And shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> Even so אֶשְׁבֹּ֞ר <S%H7665><s%> will I break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> and this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשְׁבֹּר֙ <S%H7665><s%> as [one] breaketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> vessel הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <S%H3335><s%> a potter's אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> that cannot לְהֵרָפֵ֖ה <S%H7495><s%> be made whole again ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again וּבְתֹ֣פֶת <S%H8612><s%> [them] in Tophet יִקְבְּר֔וּ <S%H6912><s%> and they shall bury מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> till [there be] no place לִקְבּֽוֹר׃ <S%H6912><s%> to bury

כֵּֽן־ <S%H3651><s%> This אֶעֱשֶׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> Thus will I do לַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto this place הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּלְיֽוֹשְׁבָ֑יו <S%H3427><s%> and to the inhabitants וְלָתֵ֛ת <S%H5414><s%> thereof and [even] make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> this city הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> like כְּתֹֽפֶת׃ <S%H8612><s%> as Tophet

וְהָי֞וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בָּתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> And the houses יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וּבָתֵּי֙ <S%H1004><s%> and the houses מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כִּמְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> as the place הַתֹּ֖פֶת <S%H8612><s%> of Tophet הַטְּמֵאִ֑ים <S%H2931><s%> shall be defiled לְכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> of all הַבָּתִּ֗ים <S%H1004><s%> because of all the houses אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whose קִטְּר֜וּ <S%H6999><s%> they have burned incense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גַּגֹּֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1406><s%> upon whose roofs לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> to all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> unto all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְהַסֵּ֥ךְ <S%H5258><s%> and have poured out נְסָכִ֖ים <S%H5262><s%> drink offerings לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> unto other פ

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> Then came יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah מֵֽהַתֹּ֔פֶת <S%H8612><s%> from Tophet אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after שְׁלָח֧וֹ <S%H7971><s%> had sent יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> whither the LORD שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לְהִנָּבֵ֑א <S%H5012><s%> him to prophesy וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> and he stood בַּחֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> in the court בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> to all the people ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold [מֵבִי כ] (מֵבִ֜יא <S%H935><s%> abide ק) אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> upon this city הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5892><s%> and upon all her towns אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the entire הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> all the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> that I have pronounced עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because הִקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H7185><s%> against it because they have hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרְפָּ֔ם <S%H6203><s%> their necks לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> not שְׁמ֥וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> that they might not hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרָֽי׃ <S%H1697><s%> my words
